snippet: Democrats say Republicans could use the intense focus on security lapses at the White House to further undercut confidence in the Obama administration.
abstract: News analysis; Democrats say Republican could use intense focus on security lapses at the White House to further undercut confidence in the Obama administration.
lead_paragraph: Democrats say Republicans could use the intense focus on security lapses at the White House to further undercut confidence in the Obama administration.

headline.main: Showing Concern for the President, Even While Criticizing Him
